title: Homemade peanut sauce
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '2 tablespoons rice wine or dry sherry', '2 teaspoons rice wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons coconut milk', '200g smooth peanut butter', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon sweet chilli sauce', '1 teaspoon minced pickled ginger', '1/2 teaspoon fish sauce']
